activities:
We may receive personal data when we engage in research projects for our clients. We encourage our clients to provide as little personal data as possible. We make use of anonymization and pseudonymization techniques whenever possible. In the context if these research assignments we may receive the following categories of information which may constitute personal data in certain circumstances:
-contact details of participants in market research projects. We may also receive data from our international website  to serve our customers containing contact information; e.g. name and email address. We also receive HR data of our employees from other companies within the Simon Kucher & Partners group for the international staffing of our customer projects (Employee privacy Policy applies).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Customer Data, Human Resources Data
recoursemech: 2B Advice Dispute Resolution Process (https://www.2b-advice.com/ws/LLC-en/Dispute-resolution); EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) with respect to human resources data only.
